about.intro1: Hey, I'm Adri√°n. I'm a Front-End Developer passionate about React, Typescript and Next.js among others, but overall I enjoy programming.
about.intro2: I grew up in Valladolid, a small city in Spain. I went to Valladolid's University (UVa) and I graduated with a degree in Computer Engineering. In my free time, I enjoy reading from Comics to technical books, riding my bicycle, spending time with my family and friends and listening to music.
about.minsait: This was my first job as a developer. I learned about web development and I experiment with different technologies and frameworks. Those days were the basis of my today solid knowledge.
about.ea: It seems like yesterday when I started working at EA. I am working in the Localization Engineering Team with React, Typescript and Javascript. The working environment and the team are exceptional. I feel excited about having such a great opportunity.
